item.title: $$$ fix this for $10 $$
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Remove it. There should also be a mymessage(); under flushOutStream(); remove that.

You can google tutorials on how to fix deadlocks, there are multiple ones iirc, theres one for synchronisation and event overloading.

Read full topic

item.title: $$$ fix this for $10 $$
item.dc:creator: @t11andreas t11andreas
item.description:
@t11andreas wrote:

public void mymessage() { EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() { public void execute(EventContainer c) { int r3 = 0; r3 = Misc.random(6); if (r3 == 0) { sendMessage("["+ Config.SERVER_NAME +" News]: Please Join the new Forums at wwww.arcane-pkz.com"); } else if (r3 == 3) { sendMessage("["+ Config.SERVER_NAME +" News]: PayPal Donations needed to get VPS! Current Ballance:" + Config.DONATION_AMOUNT + "!"); } else if (r3 == 4) { sendMessage("["+ Config.SERVER_NAME +" News]: Dont Type Letters To Withdraw From Pouch Only Use Numbers !!"); } else if (r3 == 5) { sendMessage("["+ Config.SERVER_NAME +" News]: Click Save Game In The Quest Tab Daily Just In Case"); } } }, 100000); //milisecondsservermessage };

There thats all i could find

Read full topic
